title: Jealousy = Pebhoot
creator_credit: Todor Dinov and State Distribution Centre
brief_description: Animation using musical notation whereby the stave represents the ground and groups of notes have the appearance of horses and riders, after the style of the traditional western. Includes a sequence when a treble clef is seized for use as a lassoo.
description: Animation using musical notation whereby the stave represents the ground and groups of notes have the appearance of horses and riders, after the style of the traditional western. Includes a sequence when a treble clef is seized for use as a lassoo.
